introduccion.p1: Comprehensive solution for hotels and high-demand spaces
introduccion.p2: We design, manufacture and install bespoke solutions, meeting FR/Outdoor regulations and “just in time” deadlines.

destacado.p1: End-to-end coordination: surveying, manufacturing and installation. One single accountable team.
destacado.p2: FR/IMO, Outdoor fabrics and high Martindale performance under the HARBOUR brand. Compliance with UNE, DIN, BS and IMO standards.
destacado.p3: Planning aligned with site requirements and just-in-time deliveries. On-site supervision for zero surprises.

team.heading: The Team
team.p1: The drive to improve with every project, combined with precision in execution and flawless results, inspires the creation of a team of professionals who travel worldwide to install our bespoke solutions for each project.
team.p2: Each hotel represents a new adventure and a learning experience that strengthens our expertise, as well as a new opportunity to demonstrate our agility and commitment.
team.p3: We are one team, from first to last, and we all depend on one another. From the beginning of the manufacturing process to its completion, the journey is guided by a passion for our work and respect for our colleagues.

department.heading: The Department
department.p1: In 2008, our company launched a new line dedicated to hotel fit-out. Step by step, through a wide range of projects, we professionalised and automated our Made-to-Measure division by incorporating machinery and training our team.
department.p2: Built on high-quality tailoring and just-in-time delivery, we developed our own installation team. Our goal is to shape each space by interpreting the soul of the design concept.

projects.heading: Key Projects
projects.p1: The majority of our work focuses on themed restaurants and 4- and 5-star hotels, led by some of the most renowned design studios in Spain and worldwide.
projects.p2: Boutique hotels in cities such as Berlin, Córdoba, Lisbon, London, Madrid, Marbella, Rome and Seville, as well as large-scale hotels in Cancun, Punta Cana and Jamaica.

fabrics.heading: Exclusive On-Demand Fabrics
fabrics.p1: We develop fabrics tailored to the specific regulations of each project, including UNE, DIN, BS or IMO standards. All fabrics are available under our HARBOUR brand, offering a wide range of fire-retardant and outdoor textiles.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions or would like further information about our services, please don’t hesitate to contact us. We’re here to help.
